citation: APAC page – biography of Casey Copeland, APAC chair
effects: Casey Copeland, a person in long‑term recovery, serves as the chair of the Arkansas Peer Advisory Committee and as Director of Recovery Services for the State of Arkansas. He plays a key role in creating, managing and rolling out peer recovery programs statewide and leads the committee that evaluates peer recovery supervisors and continuing education【755787514605201†L905-L929】.
